_header: Alas so sober is the might
_description: A warning to woman against false men by ‘Mersar’ — four 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) including refrain, ‘Sic perrel lyis in paramouris’

Banna.First Lines:
Allace so sobir is the michtof wemen for to mak
                    debait…
Banna.Last Lines:
…fra fals luvaris and thair resortSic perrell lyis in
                    paramouris
